snippets.title: Glassy signup form
snippets.description: A stunning glassy effect Signup form created using Tailwind CSS which you can use in your website for Authentication.

snippets.title: Animated Send Message btn
snippets.description: A cool animated Send Message button. It can be used in animation websites to grab customer attention.

snippets.title: Classy Progress bar
snippets.description: A refined progress bar that proves beneficial for level selections in your projects, offering an elegant visual representation of progress.

snippets.title: Fancy CSS Preloader
snippets.description: A Fancy CSS preloader which can be used while showing loading status to the user on your website.
